Cover Parallax

A parallax cover can be a nice way to start a page.

File to include

@include "components/parallax";

Code

See the demo here. 
<div class="cover-parallax">
        <div class="cover-parallax-img" style="background: url(/assets/images/cover-parallax.jpg)"></div>
        <div class="title-parallax">
             <h1 class="display">Cover Parallax</h1>
             <h2 class="display">Subtitle</h2>
        </div>
   </div>
   
   <div class="container-parallax">
        <main class="container">
             <section>
                  <h3>Content container</h3>
